reference.title: Group by Value

section.title: Motivation
section.p: Sometimes it is easier to understand the uses of instances of a class if the instances are grouped into sets where each object in the set has the same printable value as the others.

strow.stentry: An arbitrary set of objects to arrange in sets by value.
An optional dot notation to specify a field which is used to group the objects, e.g. modCount to group HashMaps by their modifications.
